verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al came up מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> mal-'ach- And an angel יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> hag-gil-Gal from Gilgal אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַבֹּכִ֑ים <WH1066> hab-bo-Chim; to Bochim פ Peh וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer and said אַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> 'a-'a-Leh I made you to go up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וָאָבִ֤יא <WH935> va-'a-Vi and have brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, you unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH7650> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> la-'a-Vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar and I said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not אָפֵ֧ר <WH6565> 'a-Fer break בְּרִיתִ֛י <WH1285> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> 'it-te-Chem for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. I will never

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem, you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no תִכְרְת֤וּ <WH3772> tich-re-Tu And ye shall make בְרִית֙ <WH1285> ve-Rit no league לְיֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> le-yo-she-Vei with the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, likewise מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4196> miz-be-cho-tei-Hem their altars תִּתֹּצ֑וּן <WH5422> tit-to-Tzun; ye shall throw down וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem but ye have not obeyed בְּקֹלִ֖י <WH6963> be-ko-Li my voice מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what זֹּ֥את <WH2063> zot have ye עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> 'a-si-Tem. why have ye done

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> ve-Gam also אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, Wherefore I also said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- I will not אֲגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> 'a-ga-Resh I will not drive them out אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> mip-pe-nei-Chem; from before וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu will become לָכֶם֙ la-Chem לְצִדִּ֔ים <WH6654> le-tzid-Dim, you but they shall be [as thorns] in your sides וֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> ve-Lo-hei-Hem, and their gods יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu will become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> le-mo-Kesh. shall be a snare

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> ke-dab-Ber spake מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> mal-'Ach And it came to pass when the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U lifted up הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> ha-'Am that the people אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> ko-Lam their voice וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> vai-yiv-Ku. and wept

וַֽיִּקְרְא֛וּ <WH7121> vai-yik-re-'U And they called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he בֹּכִ֑ים <WH1066> bo-Chim; Bochim וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> vai-yiz-be-chu- and they sacrificed שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham and there לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. there unto the LORD פ Peh

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> vay-shal-Lach go יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And when Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; had let the people וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> le-na-cha-la-To unto his inheritance לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH3423> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the land

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> bin- the son נ֖וּן <WH5126> nun of Nun עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- old מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> me-'Ah [being] an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> va-'E-ser and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> sha-Nim. years

וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <WH6912> vai-yik-be-Ru And they buried אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> big-Vul him in the border נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> na-cha-la-To, of his inheritance בְּתִמְנַת־ be-tim-nat- חֶ֖רֶס <WH8556> Che-res in Timnathheres בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har in the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim; of Ephraim מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tze-Fon on the north side לְהַר־ <WH2022> le-har- of the hill גָּֽעַשׁ׃ <WH1608> Ga-'ash. Gaash

וְגַם֙ <WH1571> ve-Gam also כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַדּ֣וֹר <WH1755> had-Dor And also all that generation הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he נֶאֶסְפ֖וּ <WH622> ne-'es-Fu were gathered אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <WH1> a-vo-Tav; unto their fathers וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> vai-ya-Kam and there arose דּ֨וֹר <WH1755> Dor generation אַחֵ֜ר <WH312> 'a-Cher another אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not יָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> ya-de-'U them which knew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, not the LORD וְגַם֙ <WH1571> ve-Gam nor אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> ham-ma-'a-Seh, nor yet the works אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah which he had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El. for Israel ס sa-Mek

Baalim

וַיַּעַזְב֞וּ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu And they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> a-vo-Tam, of their fathers הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> ham-mo-Tzi which brought them out אוֹתָם֮ <WH853> o-Tam מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt וַיֵּלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu along אַחֲרֵ֣י׀ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֗ים <WH312> 'a-che-Rim, other מֵאֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> me-'e-lo-Hei of the gods הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher who סְבִיב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> se-vi-Vo-tei-Hem, that [were] round about וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu them and bowed לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וַיַּכְעִ֖סוּ <WH3707> vai-yach-'I-su to anger אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. themselves unto them and provoked the LORD

וַיַּעַזְב֖וּ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu And they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> vai-ya-'av-Du and served לַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> lab-Ba-'al Baal וְלָעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH6252> ve-la-'ash-ta-Rot. and Ashtaroth

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> vai-yi-char- was hot אַ֤ף <WH639> 'af And the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, against Israel וַֽיִּתְּנֵם֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Nem and he delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- them into the hands שֹׁסִ֔ים <WH8154> sho-Sim, of spoilers וַיָּשֹׁ֖סּוּ <WH8155> vai-ya-Shos-su that spoiled אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֞ם <WH4376> vai-yim-ke-Rem them and he sold בְּיַ֤ד <WH3027> be-Yad them into the hands אֽוֹיְבֵיהֶם֙ <WH341> 'oy-vei-Hem of their enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv, round about וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no יָכְל֣וּ <WH3201> ya-che-Lu so that they could ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, not any longer לַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> la-'a-Mod stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אוֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> 'oy-vei-Hem. their enemies

בְּכֹ֣ל׀ <WH3605> be-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher they יָצְא֗וּ <WH3318> ya-tze-'U, Whithersoever they went out יַד־ <WH3027> yad- the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הָיְתָה־ <WH1961> ha-ye-tah- become בָּ֣ם bam לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> le-ra-'Ah, was against them for evil כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber had said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, as the LORD וְכַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ve-cha-'a-Sher after נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' had sworn יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and as the LORD לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וַיֵּ֥צֶר <WH3334> vai-Ye-tzer distressed לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. unto them and they were greatly

וַיָּ֥קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem raised up יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Nevertheless the LORD שֹֽׁפְטִ֑ים <WH8199> sho-fe-Tim; judges וַיּ֣וֹשִׁיע֔וּם <WH3467> vai-Yoo-shi-'Um, which delivered מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> mi-Yad them out of the hand שֹׁסֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8154> sho-sei-Hem. of those that spoiled
